Both methods were allowed the same maximum number of iterations. 8.1 Boosting Decision Tree Stumps We used decision tree stumps as base hypotheses on the following six datasets: Cancer (9,699), Diagnostic (30,569), Heart (13,297), Ionosphere (34,351), Musk (166,476), and Sonar (60,208).
